description:
hi and welcome to the course learn windows movie maker step by step.

first ,this course is composed by many video tutorials about how to edit movie project,how to import several types of clips ,images ,and audio tracks , how to add visual effects and customize the look of your movie using many other features like transitions ,pan and zoom.

also ,this course shows you how to edit an existing project by using split, trim ,copy ,cut and paste options , in addition of recordering your self by using webcam camera windows movie maker tool and many other tricks.

best regards.
title: learn windows movie maker step by step
